chorddht

Class ChordWorkerNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • chorddht.ChordWorkerNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChordNode, IChordWorkerNode, java.lang.Runnable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ChordWorkerNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, IChordWorkerNode
    A Chord node that processes tasks, instead of just simply storing data.

      • getStore

        public byte[] getStore(int key)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        References local store to get a specific requested resource with the given key. If the resource cannot be found on this node, return null.
        Specified by:
        getStore in interface IChordNode
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the resource we have.
        Returns:
        The store that the key references. If it is not present, then null is returned.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • closestPrecedingNode

        public IChordNode closestPrecedingNode(int key)

        Specified by:

        Specified by:
        notifyNode in interface IChordNode
